00062 class optCMA : public Optimizer
00063 {
00064 public:
00066         optCMA()
00067         {
00068                 parents = NULL;
00069                 offspring = NULL;
00070         }
00071 
00073         ~optCMA()
00074         {
00075                 if (parents != NULL) delete parents;
00076                 if (offspring != NULL) delete offspring;
00077         }
00078 
00079 
00082         void init(Model& model)
00083         {
00084                 init(model, 0.01);
00085         }
00086 
00090         void init(Model& model, double sigma)
00091         {
00092                 if (parents != NULL) delete parents;
00093                 if (offspring != NULL) delete offspring;
00094 
00095                 int i;
00096                 int dim = model.getParameterDimension();
00097                 int lambda = cma.suggestLambda(dim);
00098                 int mu = cma.suggestMu(lambda);
00099 
00100                 ChromosomeT<double> chrom_w(dim);
00101                 ChromosomeT<double> chrom_0(dim);
00102                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00103                 {
00104                         chrom_w[i] = model.getParameter(i);
00105                         chrom_0[i] = 0.0;
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 parents = new Population(mu, chrom_w, chrom_0);
00109                 parents->setMinimize();
00110                 offspring = new Population(lambda, chrom_w, chrom_0);
00111                 offspring->setMinimize();
00112 
00113                 cma.init(dim, sigma, *parents);
00114         }
00115 
00117         double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00118         {
00119                 int i, o;
00120                 double err;
00121                 Individual* pI;
00122                 ChromosomeT<double>* pC;
00123                 int dim = model.getParameterDimension();
00124                 int lambda = offspring->size();
00125 
00126                 // create lambda feasible offspring
00127                 for (o=0; o<lambda; o++)
00128                 {
00129                         while (true)
00130                         {
00131                                 pI = &(offspring->operator [] (o));
00132                                 cma.create(*pI);
00133                                 pC = (ChromosomeT<double>*)(&(*pI)[0]);
00134                                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00135                                 {
00136                                         model.setParameter(i, (*pC)[i]);
00137                                 }
00138                                 if (! model.isFeasible()) continue;
00139                                 err = errorfunction.error(model, input, target);
00140                                 pI->setFitness(err);
00141                                 break;
00142                         }
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 parents->selectMuLambda(*offspring, 0);
00146                 cma.updateStrategyParameters(*parents);
00147 
00148                 // Copy the best solution to the model and
00149                 // return the corresponding error value.
00150                 pI = &(parents->operator [] (0));
00151                 pC = (ChromosomeT<double>*)(&(*pI)[0]);
00152                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00153                 {
00154                         model.setParameter(i, (*pC)[i]);
00155                 }
00156                 return pI->fitnessValue();
00157         }
00158 
00159 protected:
00161         CMA2004 cma;
00162 
00164         Population* parents;
00165 
00167         Population* offspring;
00168 };
